profile_summary:
As a dedicated Senior DevOps Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in cloud technologies and automation, specializing in **AWS**, **GCP**, **Terraform**, **Ansible**, **Docker**, **Jenkins**, and **Kubernetes**. My strong foundation in CI/CD practices ensures seamless continuous deployment for high-performance solutions, while my expertise in **Python**, **Bash**, and **Golang** aids in developing efficient automation scripts and processes.
I have contributed significantly to cloud security protocols and compliance standards, aligning with frameworks such as PCI DSS and SOC 2. Alongside my DevOps skills, I possess hands-on experience in **Linux** environments, as well as monitoring with **Grafana**, **Prometheus**, and **ELK** stack. My previous background as a Full Stack Developer enables me to approach challenges from a holistic perspective, ensuring robust and secure applications while optimizing deployment workflows across various sectors including healthcare and finance.
